name: Sherif VS The Angry Gang
description:
(UPDATE V1.1: Fixed a bug where you could skip to the final battle during a cutscene.)

A game where you play ash Sherif, a guy whose name is misspelled commonly, he's not a sheriff he just doesn't like crime.

The ANGRY GANG has taken over the town! it's up to you to stop them!

Please read the README contained within the .ZIP.
